incident: Extrusion stopped mid-print at 18% due to clogged PLA nozzle
notes: Spool left out overnight and moisture popped during purge; resumed after manual purge.

incident: Layer shift on Y-axis after plate slipped halfway through build
notes: Build surface glue had worn off; print released and dragged.

incident: Touchscreen locked during preheat and ignored inputs
notes: Recovered after power-cycle but queued job lost; logs captured on USB.
